name: Jlwb
body:
### Just Like Watching Brazil 
##### (occasional thoughts on Brazilian football & footballers)

Brazilian players in the Premier League

* Anderson (Manchester United) - [Anderson Luís de Abreu Oliveira](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anderson_Lu%C3%ADs_de_Abreu_Oliveira)
* Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) - [Philippe Coutinho Correia](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Philippe_Coutinho)
* Fernando (Manchester City) - [Fernando Francisco Reges](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fernando_%28Brazilian_footballer,_born_1987%29)
* Fernandinho (Manchester City) - [Fernando Luiz Roza](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fernandinho_%28footballer%29)
* Filipe Luís (Chelsea) - [Filipe Luís Kasmirski](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Filipe_Lu%C3%ADs)
* Lucas Leiva (Liverpool) - [Lucas Pezzini Leiva](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lucas_Leiva)
* Oscar (Chelsea) - [Oscar dos Santos Emboaba Júnior](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oscar_%28footballer,_born_1991%29)
* Paulinho (Tottenham Hotspur) - [José Paulo Bezerra Maciel Júnior](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paulinho_%28footballer%29)
* Rafael (Manchester United) - [Rafael Pereira da Silva](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rafael_%28footballer,_born_1990%29)
* Ramires (Chelsea) - [Ramires Santos do Nascimento](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ramires)
* Sandro (Queens Park Rangers) - [Sandro Raniere Guimarães Cordeiro](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sandro_Raniere)
* Willian (Chelsea) - [Willian Borges da Silva](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Willian_%28footballer%29)  


***


Brazilian players in the Championship

* Fábio (Cardiff City) - [Fábio Pereira da Silva](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/F%C3%A1bio_Pereira_da_Silva) 
* Heurelho Gomes (Watford) - [Heurelho da Silva Gomes](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heurelho_Gomes)
